sentences.en: A clearing out of stocks marks a kind of economic capitulation.
sentences.cn: 清空库存意味着某种经济让步.

sentences.en: A surrender may be effected without resort to a capitulation.
sentences.cn: 投降亦得不签署投降协定而生效.

sentences.en: Bear markets often end not in capitulation but stupefaction.
sentences.cn: 熊市的尽头往往是投资者的茫然麻木而非大举溃退.

sentences.en: But that was either a variation of Vietnamization or the equivalent of capitulation.
sentences.cn: 但是这样做,要么就是变相的越南化,要么就等于投降.

sentences.en: He nodded with a peculiarly male satisfaction at her capitulation.
sentences.cn: 对她的屈服,他以一种男人特有的满足感点了点头.

sentences.en: It is during capitulation that a selloff course, and prices begin to feel for bottom.
sentences.cn: 在认赔离场的过程中,卖盘大行其道, 价格也开始探底.

sentences.en: Lord Luce's capitulation to pressure from the Duke of Edinburgh has stored up huge problems for the future.
sentences.cn: 卢斯勋爵迫于爱丁堡公爵的压力作了让步，为日后埋下了巨大隐患。

sentences.en: Oddly, even market pundits who believe in capitulation admit they can't define it.
sentences.cn: 有趣的是, 即便对抄底论深信不疑的市场老手也承认他们不知道低点在哪里.

sentences.en: Talk to enough investors and you get an idea of whether we have capitulation.
sentences.cn: 多去和投资者接触,你就会有个大概的概念市场是否已经触底.

sentences.en: The invading army had massacred many of the garrison after capitulation.
sentences.cn: 侵略军在守军投降后仍将多人屠杀了.

sentences.en: The Pain Already Feels Deep: The market is always looking for something called'capitulation.
sentences.cn: 疼痛已经是深入骨髓了: 市场总是在寻找所谓的 “ 有条件的投降”.

sentences.en: The third is the coexistence of armed resistance and capitulation in China.
sentences.cn: 第三个方向,抗战和投降并存于中国.

sentences.en: There is no specified form for capitulation.
sentences.cn: 投降协议并无固定形式.

sentences.en: They were protected until the capitulation of the fort.
sentences.cn: 他们一直受到保护直到堡垒中的人投降.

words.tran_cn: 认输，屈服；屈从，停止反抗；有条件投降；让步
（有条件的）投降；投降协定；（文件、声明等的）要点；条约

trans.tran_cn: （有条件的）投降，概要，协议，一系列条款
